content: Here is the link to the Webex: https://mdrx.webex.com/mdrx/j.php?MTID=m21c7fd9cf7316386b3fdc89a1f660073
CarePlan Track inform is here (Scroll to the bottom of the page): http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Clinicians_on_FHIR_-_Sept_2017,_San_Diego#CarePlan
Patient 226706 has a care plan converted from CDA

Hi David! Found a tool issue - is I use scenario builder and then zoom the graph, then when I go back to List tab, I can't click on any of the resources. I have to go back to Graph and unzoom to get into any of the resources in list view.

Hi Virginia - if I understand the issue then yes - zooming the graph makes it occupy the full screen so although the resource details are still there, they are hidden until you unzoom.
An alternative to zoom is the 'hide selector' link in the navbar (top right). This just hides the left pane, expanding the middle pane and the graph...

This new feature is so that for large scenarios where you have more resources and links, you can get a bigger view of them all.
(and yes, you need to click back in)
